apis.name: Standard Deviation
apis.description: Calculate the statistical volatility (standard deviation) of a portfolio's returns within a specified date range.

parameters.name: portfolio_name
parameters.description: Name of the portfolio for which to calculate standard deviation.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Starting date of the range; must be the first day of a month.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Ending date of the range; must be the last day of a month.

validation_rules.portfolio_name: Must be alphanumeric (letters, numbers, single space, underscores only), no special characters allowed except space, length between 3 and 50 characters, must map to a valid, accessible portfolio record in the database
validation_rules.start_date: Must follow ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD), must be the first day of a month, must be earlier than end_date
validation_rules.end_date: Must follow ISO format (YYYY-MM-DD), must be the last day of a month, must be later than start_date
